default.value: KnowledgeOS is a revolutionary knowledge management platform combining VS Code editing power, Obsidian-style knowledge management, and AI intelligence. Target: personal to enterprise scale. Core philosophy: Knowledge-First, AI-Native, Universal Canvas, Local-First, Extensible. Key technical stack: Electron, Monaco Editor, React/Vue, SQLite, Neo4j, MiniSearch.

Phase 1 (M1-3): Foundation - Electron app, basic UI, AI chat, file ops, markdown editor, wiki-links, search. Phase 2 (M4-6): Intelligence - Knowledge graph, AI extraction, semantic search, auto-categorization, templates. Phase 3 (M7-9): Extensibility - Plugin API, marketplace, themes, automation, integrations. Phase 4 (M10-12): Collaboration - Real-time collab, shared workspaces, version control. Phase 5 (Y2): Scale - Enterprise features, vertical markets, mobile, web platform.

https://github.com/Clemens865/knowledgeOS - Main repository for KnowledgeOS project. All progress, milestones, and documentation should be tracked here. Use Issues for tasks, Projects for sprint planning, Discussions for community feedback, and Wiki for technical documentation.

1. VS Code Monaco Editor as core editing engine. 2. Electron for cross-platform desktop. 3. React 18 for UI with glass morphism design. 4. SQLite for local storage + Neo4j for knowledge graph. 5. LangChain.js for AI orchestration with multi-provider support. 6. Local-first with optional sync. 7. Plugin architecture similar to VS Code. 8. CRDT-based collaboration. 9. TypeScript throughout.

Project analysis complete. Created DEVELOPMENT_PLAN.md with 5 phases over 12+ months. Created PROJECT_CONTEXT.md for quick onboarding. Created GITHUB_TRACKING.md for progress management. Ready to begin Phase 1.1: Electron + Monaco setup. All documentation stored locally and in memory system for continuity.

Major insight: Repository IS the assistant. No need to build complex app first. Use existing AI coding assistants (Claude Code, Windsurf, Cursor) with structured markdown and rules. Immediate value, grows through use. KnowledgeOS app becomes enhanced interface later.

Building full KnowledgeOS desktop application. NOT just repository with rules. Using VS Code Monaco Editor as core, Electron for desktop, React for UI with glass morphism. Markdown files for storage but within proper application. Original vision provides conceptual foundation only.

Building full KnowledgeOS desktop application. Phase 1.1: Electron + Monaco Editor setup. Using VS Code architecture as foundation. Glass morphism UI from mockup. Markdown-based knowledge storage. This is a complete application, not just a folder with rules.

Phase 1.1 COMPLETE! KnowledgeOS Electron app with Monaco Editor is running. Built main process with IPC handlers, menu system, file operations. Integrated Monaco Editor with markdown support. Glass morphism UI partially implemented. App launches successfully with sidebar, editor, chat panel, and command palette.
